name: The Best Birthday
description:
You have 19 best friends and they all share a birthday with you! And that's today! You ordered 20 random presents off the internet for them but you aren't sure who would like what… yet...

20 characters to interact with! Over 600 lines of dialog! Everyone has a different reaction to the presents you give them!

Controls:

Z to interact

X to drop a held present and skip text

C to hear your inner thoughts

Created for the GameMaker 20 Jam #GM20. Source files were submitted directly to YoYo Games in reference to this thread.

Can you make today... The Best Birthday? 🎂
